events.text:
[wave amp=10 freq=50][color=#FA0000]HOLD UP!!![/color][/wave]
That must be what is causing all this fuss...
Well... All i can say is, if it is a boss enemy, shoot it's eye with a bow or something

[wave amp=10 freq=50][color=#FA0000]I KNOW IT'S OBVIOUS DON'T LOOK AT ME LIKE THAT[/color][/wave]
Get in that mirror already
